item.description:
Manchester United transfer news: Romelu Lukaku ‘considering future’ at the club because of Jose Mourinho  talkSPORT

Romelu Lukaku is considering his future at Manchester United after growing frustrated with manager Jose Mourinho, according to reports. The Belgian striker becomes the latest unhappy Red Devils star, with fellow big-money signings Paul Pogba and Alexis Sanchez also unsettled at Old Trafford. Lukaku has struggled for goals this season According to The Sun, Lukaku would weigh up his future at the club if his spell out of the team continues. The 25-year-old has dropped to the bench for several big games recently, including the 2-2 draw against Arsenal on Wednesday. The striker is no longer an ...

item.title: Manchester United team news: Anthony Martial and Eric Bailly face late injury tests of Fulham clash - The Independent
item.description:
Manchester United team news: Anthony Martial and Eric Bailly face late injury tests of Fulham clash  The Independent

Anthony Martial, Chris Smalling and Phil Jones are among the players that could be absent for Manchester United against Fulham. The trio will be assessed on Friday, as will centre-back Eric Bailly after Wednesday’s 2-2 draw against Arsenal. Luke Shaw is hoping to return after missing that match with a knock and Ashley Young is back from suspension. Paul Pogba and Romelu Lukaku will be hoping to return to the starting line-up after being dropped to the bench against the Gunners, but Victor Lindelof (groin) and Alexis Sanchez (hamstring) are out. There is unlikely to be any place in the side ...

item.title: Liverpool ‘unlikely’ to recall Harry Wilson from Derby loan in January - talkSPORT
item.description:
Liverpool ‘unlikely’ to recall Harry Wilson from Derby loan in January  talkSPORT

Liverpool are unlikely to recall Harry Wilson from his loan spell with Derby in January, reports claim. The Wales winger, 21, has been in sensational form for the Rams, scoring eight goals since joining the Championship club on a season-long loan in July. Harry Wilson has scored some cracking goals for Derby this season He is playing a huge role in the Rams’ promotion push with only goal difference keeping them out of the top six. Earlier this week, Derby boss Frank Lampard revealed Liverpool have an option to bring Wilson back to Anfield in January. He said: “There is an element where Live...

item.title: Jose Mourinho admits Manchester United will not win the Premier League title unless City and Liverpool stop spending - talkSPORT
item.description:
Jose Mourinho admits Manchester United will not win the Premier League title unless City and Liverpool stop spending  talkSPORT

Jose Mourinho says Manchester City and Liverpool must stop spending before Manchester United can challenge them for the title. The Red Devils, who have not won the league since 2013, are already 18 points adrift of league-leaders City and Mourinho insists that gap will remain unless their spending is curbed. Mourinho says United will struggle to close the gap to City and Liverpool Pep Guardiola’s side have been threatened with a Champions League ban after allegedly circumventing Financial Fair Play rules, while Mourinho has made no attempt to hide his frustration with United’s lack of activ...
